title: Artificial and Natural Flavors
description: This senior thesis project was created with the prompt, making the invisible, visible. Artificial and natural flavors are virtually the same, and this video was made to explain the terms associated with flavoring and nutrition, talk about the problem, and a proposed solution. Challenges included storyboarding, animation and writing scripts, doing voice-overs.
